text: James Rupert Jacob Murdoch (born 13 December 1972) is a British-American businessman. ==Early life== Murdoch was born in the United Kingdom. He is the younger son of Rupert Murdoch. "James Murdoch: A chip off the old block?" BBCNews, 4 November 2003; retrieved 2012-11-6. At age 13, young James' citizenship changed. In 1985, his father gave up his Australian citizenship to become a citizen of the United States.Tuccille, Jerome. (1989). Rupert Murdoch: Creator of a Worldwide Media Empire, p. 103. ==Career== He has worked in his family's international businesses. ==References== ==Other websites== *James Murdoch at Forbes Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Businesspeople from London
title: James Murdoch
